How can I rewrite the story in the present continuous tense, using the formula "subject + am/is/are + verb-ing"?
[Subject], [am/is/are] currently a regular visitor to the museum. [Subject] [go/goes] there every week.

To rewrite the story in the present continuous tense, you can structure the sentences as follows:

1. "[Subject] is currently visiting the museum regularly."
2. "[Subject] is going there every week."
